product_name: Lawn Aid Heat Stress Prevention Treatment
description:
When lawns are heat-stressed—get Lawn Aid.

The perfect nutrients to fortify your lawn against heat and drought stress this season.

Enriched with seaweed extract and potassium, Lawn Aid drives deep root growth for unmatched heat resilience. Tailor-made for high-temperature areas and summer heat, Lawn Aid ensures your lawn is not only equipped to handle the summer sun but sustains under it.

Consciously formulated without pesticides, Sunday champions planet-friendly solutions for your lawn's most pressing lawn and climate challenges.

sections.ingredients: Potassium: Heat tolerance and plant health
sections.instructions:
For best results, apply early morning or late evening to a well-hydrated lawn.
Connect the custom-engineered sprayer to the hose and pouch to apply the perfect water-to-nutrient ratio.
Distribute evenly across your lawn in a sweeping motion until the pouch is depleted, typically in 10-15 minutes.
Water your lawn thoroughly post-application. Once the lawn dries, you can get back out on your grass.
Reapply every 4 weeks spring through fall, up to 8 times per year.
If using other Sunday products, let liquid fertilizers dry completely before applying anything else to the lawn.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
When is the best time to apply?
The best time of year to apply is before peak summer heat, typically in April, May or June. Lawn Aid is designed to prepare your lawn for heat stress and needs time to be absorbed before your lawn is exposed to extreme summer heat.
Can I apply more than once a season?
Yes! You can apply one pouch to actively growing grass every 4 to 6 weeks. Do not exceed 8 applications per growing season.
Can I use Lawn Aid with my custom nutrients?
Yes! Lawn Aid can be used in combination with your custom lawn plan. No waiting period is required but we recommend waiting until the first application is dry. This may take between 4 and 24 hours depending on your climate.
When is it safe for people and pets to go on my lawn after applying?
Our ingredients break down quickly and don’t persist in the environment. After our products dry, you can get back to playing outside right away!
Are there any US states where this is not approved for use?
This product is approved for use in all states.
